name: SmartTech Pro4K Ultra HD Smart TV
short_desc: 55-Inch4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with Voice Control
long_desc: Experience stunning picture quality and smart features with the SmartTech Pro4K Ultra HD Smart TV. This55-inch LED TV offers vibrant colors, deep blacks, and immersive audio. Perfect for movie nights, gaming, or binge-watching your favorite shows.

about_item.description: 13mm Full Range Dynamic drivers - Experience audio sensation like no other with the powerful 13mm driver that delivers rich, dynamic sound that transforms your music listening experience.
Bluetooth 5.3 - Embrace the future of wireless connectivity with Bluetooth 5.3 for fast, stable, and hassle-free pairing.
30dB ANC - Immerse yourself in exceptional, immersive audio and enjoy uninterrupted peace as unwanted noise fades away with 30dB Active Noise Cancellation.
40ms low latency Gaming Mode - Dive into the excitement of real-time gaming with the 50ms Low Latency Gaming Mode, unleashing uninterrupted action and elevating your gaming to new heights.

IPX4 water resistance - Enjoy your music with peace of mind, knowing your earbuds are protected from water splashes and can withstand various weather conditions for an uninterrupted listening experience.
Voice Assistance - Experience enhanced convenience and seamless control with the personal voice assistant, providing instant information and assistance with a simple command.

product_specifications.label: Connectivity Options
product_specifications.value: HDMI x3, USB x2, Ethernet, Wi-Fi

reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is breathtaking! Love the smart features. Setup was a breeze!
Great TV for the price! The sound could be better, but overall a solid purchase.
The smart features are cool, but I faced some issues with the remote control. It's decent for the price.
